author: Special Correspondent
text:
P.C. Sreeram has been elected president of the South Indian Film Cinematographers’ Association (SICA). According to a press release, ‘Nadunilai Ani’ (Mr. Sreeram's Team) made a clean sweep in the SICA elections.

Mr. Sreeram secured 555 votes, secretary Kannan secured 443 and treasurer Ramnath Shetty secured 445 votes. The joint secretaries elected are Balamurugan, Ilavarasan and Sridhar while Rajiv Menon and Priyan were elected as vice-presidents.
title: P.C. Sreeram elected president of cinematographers’ body
